thread.title: Americans’ Confidence Slips But Remains Historically High

author: Josh Mitchell
title: Americans’ Confidence Slips But Remains Historically High
text:
Americans’ confidence in the economy slipped this month but remains high compared with historical levels.
The University of Michigan said Friday its index of consumer sentiment dropped 2.6 points from a month earlier to a reading of 98.8 in April. Still, that figure was nearly 2 points above the level posted a year ago.
The latest monthly...
